title: How to Drink Marmite

steps.headline: Spoon marmite into a mug - about two thirds of a teaspoon will be sufficient.
steps.description: You can vary how much marmite you use depending on how much you can handle.

steps.headline: Boil water in a kettle.
steps.description: Enough water to fill the mug.

steps.headline: Pour the boiling water into the mug.
Stir the mixture until it becomes a light brown colour throughout.
Wait for the broth to cool before drinking
If you wish, dip buttered bread into your broth to turn it into a meal.
Insert all the ingredients into a mixing glass and add ice.
Strain the mixture into a 12oz Collins (without ice).

text: Marmite Broth Spoon marmite into a mug - about two thirds of a teaspoon will be sufficient. You can vary how much marmite you use depending on how much you can handle. Boil water in a kettle. Enough water to fill the mug. Pour the boiling water into the mug.  Stir the mixture until it becomes a light brown colour throughout.  Wait for the broth to cool before drinking  If you wish, dip buttered bread into your broth to turn it into a meal.  Marmite Bloody Mary Insert all the ingredients into a mixing glass and add ice.  Stir very well.  Strain the mixture into a 12oz Collins (without ice).  Garnish the cocktail with a celery stick and lemon wedge.
